name: Gymnastics Salon - Makeup & Dressup Girls Game
summary:
This is the fully unlocked version and it does not have advertisements! 

The world gymnastics championship is about to begin! The world's best gymnast girls will be competing for the coveted championship title and the fancy medals that will be awarded. These girls will not only be judged for their gymnastics talents, but will also be scored on their overall presentation. This includes their makeup, costume and artistic effect. And you are the trusted person who is in charge of styling the girls for the competition! 

When you start the game, you’ll find the gymnasts in the dance classroom practicing their gymnastics routines. You choose a girl by tapping on her name, and then you’ll start the makeover by giving her a facial treatment at the spa. There you use exfoliator, cleanser, face humidifier, and powder to make her face clean and clear.

Next the gymnast heads to the makeup room. You apply her makeup, including face paint, so she looks beautiful and will appear amazing on TV. You are also in charge of choosing her hairstyle so it will be pretty and flowing when she performs her incredible gymnastics routines.

Then you finalize her look by dressing her in leotard, tights and slippers. Finally, you’ll select an apparatus for her performance. These can include hoop, clubs, ribbon, and ball. 

It’s a lot of work being a world-class gymnast! Thanks to you, she’s now ready to shine for the gymnastics fans that have gathered in the big arena!
